body.p: I was judge of the County Court of Laurel Co at the time the fine was assed against Israel & Adams and at that time twice the security Stewart could have indemnified himself with the property of the principles now he cannott and could not have done so after the expiration of the year, for which the Governor respited the collection of the said fine

Boyd County
Relief Refused
Tho E Bramlette
64
